title: My Google Pixel 3 XL automatically factory reset itself, and after system updates, it's very glitchy
content:
I just woke up and checked my phone for time, but it was asking what language to set up.
I was surprised and had to set everything up.
I still have no clue what happened to my phone. I don't think I sleepwalked and pressed the factory reset button myself.
I am speculating that it tried to update the phone firmware, but during the process, reset happened or something.
Did anyone experience a similar situation?
Does anyone know what is going on? Please help! Thank you.
